CONTENT
ARTICLE
About Meadowood
Meadowood Golf and Tennis Club redefines the semi-private club experience with first-rate facilities and services. It is nestled just minutes from I-95, the Florida Turnpike, Vero Beach, and Downtown Fort Pierce.
Our sanctuary features an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Charles Ankrom. Recognized as one of the finest on the Treasure Coast, it provides challenging yet fair play for all skill levels. Our tennis amenities include five har-tru courts, three illuminated for evening play, and a full schedule of competitive and league activities organized by our pro.
Additionally, Meadowood is an ideal venue for weddings, parties, corporate events, and celebrations, offering flexible function spaces, exceptional catering, and unparalleled service to ensure the highest caliber of events
.
About Meadowood
Meadowood Golf and Tennis Club redefines the semi-private club experience with first-rate facilities and services. It is nestled just minutes from I-95, the Florida Turnpike, Vero Beach, and Downtown Fort Pierce.
Our sanctuary features an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Charles Ankrom. Recognized as one of the finest on the Treasure Coast, it provides challenging yet fair play for all skill levels. Our tennis amenities include five har-tru courts, three illuminated for evening play, and a full schedule of competitive and league activities organized by our pro.
Additionally, Meadowood is an ideal venue for weddings, parties, corporate events, and celebrations, offering flexible function spaces, exceptional catering, and unparalleled service to ensure the highest caliber of events
.

CONTENT
ARTICLE
Amenities
Meadowood offers various amenities tailored to cater to its members' recreational and social needs. Dining options include a fine dining restaurant featuring gourmet cuisine with seasonal menus, complemented by casual dining at the bar and grill in the clubhouse. Private dining rooms are available for special events, while outdoor dining is available during favorable weather. Bar and lounge areas provide a variety of beverages, including cocktails, wines, and craft beers, with catering services offered for weddings, parties, and corporate meetings hosted at the club.
The pool and fitness center are adjacent to the tennis clubhouse and feature tables, umbrellas, and seating for families, couples, and individuals. A large area can accommodate various outdoor activities. Poolside dining options provide casual meals, snacks, and drinks served conveniently by the pool.
Weddings & Events
An ideal venue for weddings, parties, corporate events, and celebrations.

CONTENT
ARTICLE
Weddings and Events
Weddings and Events
Meadowood Golf & Tennis Club is the perfect venue for your next special occasion. Whether you’re planning an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, our elegant and versatile event spaces can accommodate events of all sizes and styles, including:
Weddings
– Celebrate your big day in a stunning setting with exceptional service.
Parties
– From birthdays to anniversaries, we create unforgettable moments.
Reunions
– Gather with family and friends in a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
Meetings
– Host productive corporate events with a professional touch.
Fundraisers
– Elevate your charitable event with top-tier hospitality.
A Premier Venue for Any Occasion
Our clubhouse features one of the largest banquet venues in the area, offering a sophisticated ambiance for both formal and informal gatherings. Whether you envision a lavish plated dinner or a relaxed buffet-style event, our customizable menus cater to a wide range of tastes and dietary needs.
Exceptional Cuisine & Service
Meadowood takes pride in offering an extensive selection of gourmet entrée and buffet menus, along with a fully stocked bar to complement your event. Our experienced culinary team crafts delicious, high-quality dishes, while our attentive staff ensures seamless service from start to finish.
Plan Your Event with Us
At Meadowood, we take care of every detail so you can enjoy a stress-free experience. Let us help bring your vision to life with expert coordination, impeccable service, and a beautiful setting.
View the Photo Gallery
